Method Detail

authorize

public void authorize(java.lang.String authUri,
                      ResponseType responseType,
                      java.lang.String clientId,
                      java.lang.String clientSecret,
                      java.lang.String scopes,
                      java.lang.String redirectUri,
                      java.lang.String state,
                      java.lang.String nonce,
                      Prompt prompt,
                      int maxAge,
                      java.lang.String acrValues,
                      AuthorizationOptions authorizationOptions,
                      AuthorizationListener listener,
                      Activity activity)
Handles the process between the MNO and the end user for the end user to sign in/ authorize the application. The application hands over to the browser during the authorization step. On completion the MNO redirects to the application sending the completion information as URL parameters.

Parameters:
authUri - authorization endpoint.
responseType - (CODE).
clientId - which is an ID for the application.
clientSecret - which is an secret for the application.
scopes - which is an application specified string value.
redirectUri - which is the return point after the user has authenticated/consented.
state - which is application specified.
nonce - which is application specified.
prompt - (NONE, LOGIN, CONSENT, SELECT_ACCOUNT).
maxAge - which is an integer value.
acrValues - which is an application specified.
authorizationOptions - structure in which you can provide values for any of the optional parameters in the authorization request: Display, Ui_locales, Claims_locales, Id_token_hint, Login_hint and Dtbs.
listener - It is necessary to implement authorizationCodeResponse(String state, String authorizationCode, String error, String clientId, String clientSecret, String scopes, String redirectUri) and authorizationError(String reason) to manage the response
activity -
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException

extractRedirectParameter

public ParameterList extractRedirectParameter(java.lang.String returnUri)
Helper function developed to parse the redirect sent by the authorization server to the application and extract code, state and error values.

Parameters:
returnUri - which is the return point after the user has authenticated/consented.
Returns:
ParameterList
